page.title: 04Parkside Special School
page.content: Parkside Special School caters for 63 pupils between the ages of 2 and 19yrs, all with severe learning difficulties. The school (built in 1978)is situated in Mullen Road,a residential area of Wallsend,but the intake is not limited only to Wallsend.Although there are 24 children in our class,in a Special School like Parkside a teacher might have the care of as few as 4 children because of their individual needs for much special attention. As a result of their difficulties these children will not receive the sort of education that we take for granted,but they do have extra facilities there t we do not enjoy,including an on site swimming pool.However ,our class all agree that they must have everything which might help to improve their quality of life.
